Immutable Infrastructure as a Service (IIaaS)
=============================================

<div align="center">
    <img src="docs/static/img/logo.svg" width="20%" />

What is IIaaS
-------------

[IIaaS] is a technology-agnostic framework for general Continuous Delivery/Deployment onto AWS through HashiCorp

The goal of [IIaaS] is to **empower _individual_ to agnostically deploy and manage applications through the
practice of immutable infrastructure**.

![Error loading iiaas.png](./docs/docs/img/iiaas.png)

A Story About IIaaS
-------------------

On a regular day, having had every hatred against old and stupid manual deployments,
[a young backend engineer](https://github.com/Qubitpi) was trying to automate the deployment of his software. During his
search of the latest technologies, he got really excited with this notion of
[Immutable Infrastructure](https://www.hashicorp.com/resources/what-is-mutable-vs-immutable-infrastructure). Today, the
young man releases his belief, endowed in this project [IIaaS], that software infrastructure in the future shall not
only be fully automatic, but also technology-agnostic, making general software deployment available to everybody.

Documentation
-------------

More information about [IIaaS] can be found at our [documentation][IIaaS].
